column1: '''''penn''''', or '''''pend''''', is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "slope". The plural form of ''penn'' is '''''pinn''''' or '''''pind'''''. The collective plural form is '''''pennath''''' (cf. ''[[-ath]]''). A variant (dialectical or [[Gondor Sindarin]]) plural form is ''[[pinnath]]''.<ref name=PE>{{PE
'''''penn''''', or '''''pend''''', is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "declivity".<ref name=LR>{{LR
